title: An Act relative to vehicle recalls

abstracts.abstract: Shenate, November 10, 2025  -- The committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 291) of John C. Velis for legislation relative to vehicle recalls, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2664).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
